thread.section_title: Saatva Mattress Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Saatva Mattress | saatvamattress.com
thread.title: Manuel

author: Manuel
title: Manuel
text: Was really worried about buying a mattress on line with out trying it first but we took the plunge how can you go wrong with 75 day try it at home so far it's been two weeks and it's probably the best bed I've slept in any where . I might have chosen the wrong box spring it's a little high but I feel like a king , I think I can adjust the slats when we age because I think this beds gona last with us .. so thanks again SAATVA!!
